channel.title: I need a Auto Restarter that works and saves players
channel.description:
Ok I tried to use two different auto restarters and none of them make me satisfied.
First I used a command to restart which restarts and saves players but runs stealth and sometimes it doesen't work.
Second I used Voule Auto Restarter.exe with Voule.bat and I think I set it up right and when it restarts it doesen't save peoples files so they lose items/xp etc.
Please help me!
Thank You

item.title: I need a Auto Restarter that works and saves players
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

Kk,

I got

public boolean process() { //AutoSave savecounter++; if(savecounter >= 5 && AutoSave == false) { AutoSave = true; savecounter = 0; }

But it doesen’t save.

Why does dodian have to be so COMPLICATED?

Read full topic
item.source: I need a Auto Restarter that works and saves players

@Phree_xp wrote:

Thats true, 85 percent will learn anything and never try, and those 65 percent will fail in a lot of things they do, but the one’s that will learn and will try to like me, sometime’s need help, so it’s better if you help someone who want, then the one’s that will learn from it.

item.title: I need a Auto Restarter that works and saves players
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

lol my auto restarter is kinda ghetto, what i do is i have an auto save so it saves every ones game like 2-3 times a minute, then i have a my guy logged in sitting in some remote place, i have a scar script that loggs him out and in, and if it cant log him in it restarts, and i also have it auto click my port checker that i made, if the port returns as closed or w/e, i have it restart. could do something like that, or you could do something simpler, idk…

Read full topic

item.source: I need a Auto Restarter that works and saves players

item.title: I need a Auto Restarter that works and saves players
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

[quote=“elitescouter, post:7, topic:171649”][quote author=xx nub xx link=topic=231706.msg1983196#msg1983196 date=1199695485]

I don’t want my server to go anywhere! I want it to stay home!!!

LOL!

Anyways my server is allready established and has avg of 40-50 people at all times. I just got back from work finding my server crashed again 12 hrs later. I really need to put a auto restarter. I added 2 of them and neither of them work the way I want it to work. How can I make the Voule Auto Restarter kick everyone before it restarts?

Thats all I’m asking.

just fix the errors that cause it to crash, my server has been on for 24 hours with no restart and no crash.

but if you wan’t a good restarter either make a scheduled task which can be done in the control panel or use voule because it is the best one
[/quote]

K thanks that sounds good.

But I just set the Voule for 10 min restart to see if it works but it doesen’t save people b4 it restarts. I spawned an item like 1 min before it restarted and it dissapeared when I logged in.

Am I doing something wrong?[/quote]

either your server has no autosave or its set really low, just make it faster (mine autosaves every two seconds)

Read full topic
